items.sentence: Tom assured us that he won't do that anymore.
Tom and I had hoped you could do that for us.
Make sure that you don't do that by yourself.
I know I shouldn't have asked you to do that.
Tom thought Mary might need to do that today.
Tom thought Mary might need to do that again.
Tom thought Mary might be allowed to do that.
Tom should've asked Mary to help him do that.
Tom said that Mary didn't do that by herself.
I didn't realize what was happening at first.
Do you have an unmarried sister about my age?
If a job's worth doing, it's worth doing well
How dare you talk about my daughter that way!
From now on, I promise I'll get here on time.
There are various ways to get to Tom's house.
I'm always tense before I get on an airplane.
I believe Tom said that he'd be here by 2:30.
Somebody has to stay here and look after Tom.
We checked in at the Hilton at three o'clock.
How about having supper outside this evening?
